title: Introducing the nuke-o-meter
content: We love it when you do neat things with our data and Adam Charnock has produced something very neat indeed. He took our data on the world's stocks of active nuclear weapons and produced the nuke-o-meter, which tells you how many warheads are in range of your home town. As if swine flu wasn't enough… DATA: the world in nuclear weapons GRAPHIC: how we visualised this data (PDF) • Can you do something with this data? Please post us your visualisations and mash-ups below or mail us at datastore@theguardian.com See all our data at the Datastore directory • Follow us on Twitter
summary:
We love it when you do neat things with our data and Adam Charnock has produced something very neat indeed.
He took our data on the world's stocks of active nuclear weapons and produced the nuke-o-meter, which tells you how many warheads are in range of your home town.
